column1: Art Institute of Chicago////$35 admission. Make sure you get tickets in advance online to avoid a wait. I am a lover of art and was personally impressed with the works of artists like Picasso
column7: Rene Magritte and more. We also enjoyed the photography exhibit when you enter on the left. It displayed various photographs of people from Bobo. Â There was also a film exhibition which was interesting. There were areas for contemporary and modern art as well as Asian
column9: and other cultures. Definitely give yourself time to walk around and explore as there is so much to see.
